subject: CNN.com Daily Top 10
body:
CNN.com Daily Top 10


































Imus: 'Embarrassed'
Radio host Don Imus will appear on Rev. Al Sharpton's radio show Monday. Imus said he was "embarrassed" by his racially charged comments.

10. Supplements lack scientific proof




 
















When fish attack
A 57-pound fish jumps into a boat and attacks a man. Central Florida News 13's David Waters reports (April 8)
